item.title: MIUI V14.0.7.0.TMACNXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi 13 Ultra China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi 13 Ultra China

Codename: ishtar

Version: V14.0.7.0.TMACNXM | 13.0

Size: 358 Bytes

MD5: cd5ced49481f09d55781c93d986bda73

Changelog:
[System]
Updated Android Security Patch to April 2023. Increased system security.
Updated Android Security Patch to April 2023. Increased system security.
[Camera]
The default zoom rate for Quick snap mode changed to 1.5X
Focal length options for Quick snap mode changed to 0.6m/1.2m/5m

Download: Here
